code: var initState={newsState:'Guardian'};var newsReducer=function newsReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type=='CHANGE_NEWS'){console.log("from store",action.newsValue);return{newsState:action.newsValue};}return state;};export default newsReducer;
